main_features.name: Web Scraping Engine
main_features.description: Extracts data from the EU's convocation index using Scrapy and other libraries.

main_features.name: Database Management
main_features.description: Manages a PostgreSQL database for storing convocation data using SQLAlchemy.

main_features.name: API Endpoints
main_features.description: Provides REST API endpoints for accessing convocation data via FastAPI.

main_features.name: Dashboard
main_features.description: Offers a web-based dashboard for monitoring, analyzing, and displaying convocation data.

technical_stack.name: Middleware
technical_stack.details: Custom Scrapy middlewares for handling JavaScript and retry logic

AttributeError: module 'app.routers.task.description: The error indicates that the 'tasks' module does not have an attribute named 'router'. This could be due to a missing import or incorrect router definition.
AttributeError: module 'app.routers.task.action: Check the 'app/routers/tasks.py' file to ensure that a FastAPI router is correctly defined and imported in the main application file.
